I just want to say, first of all, thank you to the Academy...
...and to Stephen Fitzmaurice who I forgot in my last one.
...I just want to say that before I made this record,...
...I was doing everything to try and get my music heard.
I tried to lose weight and I was making awful music...
...and it was only until I started to be myself that the music started to flow and people started to listen..
So thank you guys for accepting me for being just me.
